name: Epic.Psionic_Mastery_Domingator
display_help: You have Mastery over Psionics and the mind to blast your foes, increase your power, and to add some much needed armor and defense.

powers.name: Epic.Psionic_Mastery_Domingator.Link_Minds
powers.display_help: Your Mind Link Power will enable you to link the minds of all your teammates who are near you for the next 90 seconds. This shared link improves your team's chance to hit foes, your defensive abilities and dramatically reduces psionic damage. Recharge: Very Long

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 35 ft. radius (255 targets max)
display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 2.81% to hit for 1m 30s on target
Unresistable
1.70% resistance to psionic damage for 1m 30s on target
Unresistable
4.25% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 1m 30s on target
Unresistable

powers.name: Epic.Psionic_Mastery_Domingator.Indomitable_Will
powers.display_help: Activating this power greatly boosts your resistance to Sleep, Disorient, Fear and Hold effects for 90 seconds. Indomitable Will also grants a high defense to Psionic based attacks. Recharge: Very Long
powers.display_short_help: Self Res( Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear). DEF(Psionics)

display_info: -10.0 confuse protection, terrorize protection, hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 1m 30s on self

powers.name: Epic.Psionic_Mastery_Domingator.Mind_Over_Body
powers.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you empower your Mind Over Body to become highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage. You must be level 41 and have Link Minds or Indomitable Will before selecting this power. Recharge: Very Fast

powers.name: Epic.Psionic_Mastery_Domingator.World_of_Confusion
powers.display_help: This toggle power allows you to cause psionic damage and cause confusion within a group of foes, creating chaos. The chance of confusing an enemy is lower than then chance of damaging them, and it may take multiple hits to affect stronger opponents. All affected foes within the area will turn and attack each other, ignoring all heroes. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by Confused enemies. You must be level 41 and have Link Minds or Indomitable Will before selecting this power. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DoT(Psionic), Foe Confuse

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 8 ft. radius (10 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Psionic_Mastery_Domingator.Psionic_Tornado
powers.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. You must be level 44 and have two other Psionic Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
